FuncDef:
The description command creates or changes the description of a virtual system (VS).
The undo description command deletes the description of a VS.
A VS does not have a description by default.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of a VS.
The value is a string of 1 to 242 characters, with spaces supported. The description describes the usage of a VS and the service carried by the VS. If this command is not used, the VS does not have a description.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
VSs are able to carry various types of services. To help users grasp information about a VS, the network administrator can configure a description for the VS to describe the service type or usage. To configure a VS description, run the description command.
Precautions
Before you create or change the description of a VS, ensure that the VS has been established.
